localised_description: Wolves and Skinwolves flock around the Black Wolf.
The Skinwolves of Norsca follow the Packleader without Question. Recruitment cost reduction: -20% for Skinwolves (Lord's army)
The Packleader calls, the pack answers
While the transformation into a beast is temporary, some abilites manifest themselves even untransformed.
Skin Wolves in Rafford's service enjoy speed and skill beyond even their preternatural capabilities.
After battle the mangled gore that remains is devoured by Rafford and his ravenous, insatiable Werekin.
These frenzied creatures, whose packs are formed by kinship ties of blood and slaughter, care not what they kill in their bloodlust and bear no loyalty to any master, save the Dark Gods themselves.
This Packlord has drawn the attention of the gods with his hunts, earning the chance to receive their favour.

Although Wulfrik is the better-known bearer of this title, Rafford is possessed of a keen curiosity about the wider world. Having secured a land for his tribe, he now sets forth on many journeys to see what there is to discover, hunt, or conquer.
Though they once were drifters and vagrants, the elite warriors of the Tribe of the Wolf have proven themselves to be a disciplined unit to be feared.
